# Random Matrices

$\dfn \textbf{Random Matrix.}$ Suppose we have an arbitrary matrix, $P \in \M_\R[M,N]$ for some $M,N \in \N^+$. Then, we call $P$ a random matrix is all of its entries $p_{ij}$ are random variables.
